::Lavatron::

Lavatron lifts his leg, though the blast still hits him.

"Don't piss me off," he replies, firing two lightning bolts in rapid
succession down at Tantrum.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Seeing his target leave and attack rampage, Tantrum gets upset,
"DON'T
> IGNORE ME" he yells, jumping towards the large robot, and swinging
his
> electric blade towards one of the Giants legs.
